NewsItem.HEADLINE: 5G Broadband Forecast Update
NewsItem.SUMMARY: A brief end-to-end forecast update for 5G, including infrastructure and all types of client devices. Forecast through 2025.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This forecast update includes an Excel sheet and a one-page list of bullet points to illustrate what has changed since we published our February 2018 manifesto on 5G. Infrastructure estimates include macro base stations and small cells. Client device projections include smartphones, CPEs, computing devices, and IoT.
